Class CleanupProgressEventArgs

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Models.Events
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Provides data for the OnCleanupProgress event. Reports progress updates during a cleanup operation.

public class CleanupProgressEventArgs : EventArgs

Parameters

currentStep string

Description of the current cleanup step being executed.

stepNumber int

The current step number (1-based).

totalSteps int

The total number of steps in the cleanup process.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown when currentStep is null.
